title: Spotify Wants to Get Into Audiobooks but Says Apple Is in the Way
description: Apple has rejected Spotify’s new app three times from its App Store. It is the latest in a series of confrontations between the two companies.
dc:creator: Tripp Mickle
media:credit: Jeenah Moon for The New York Times
media:description: Nir Zicherman spearheaded Spotify’s effort to get into the audiobooks business.
